page.title: 09West Dart Community Bus
page.content: {The parishes of Blackawton and {Dittisham}are combining to run a{16 {seater minibus}to provide transport for the residents of the area.It is due to come into service in August 1985.A team of{volunteer drivers}has been trained to P.S.V.standard.The bus will enable people to go on{shopping} {trips}to Dartmouth,Kingsbridge and Totnes.It will also be available for {hire}by{local groups and {organisations. } {Financial help}has been given by Devon County Council.An{attractive logo}has been designed with help from{children} of{Blackawton Primary School. } In order to have a{regular source of {income}the bus will also be{used to {take children to and from school. }
